Airlangga: Golkar Siap Laksanakan Agenda Politik
02 Nov 2019, 11:08 by Uji Sukma Medianti
Manado - Dukungan kepada Airlangga Hartarto untuk menduduki Ketua Umum Partai Golkar pada Munas Desember 2019 di Jakarta kembali mengalir. Kali ini dukungan disampaikan oleh organisasi Tri Karya Partai Golkar, agar Menko Perekonomian ini memimpin partai beringin periode 2019-2024.
Dalam acara Konsolidasi Nasional Ormas Tri Karya Golkar, pada Jumat (1/11/2019) di Manado, Sulut, ketiga organisasi itu Kosgoro 57, Soksi dan MKGR menyampaikan dukungannya. Ketiganya secara langsung memberikan surat rekomendasi kepada Airlangga yang juga hadir dalam pertemuan itu.
Airlangga sendiri menyambut baik kepercayaan yang diberikan kepadanya tersebut. "Semua menginginkan Partai Golkar menjadi Partai besar. Golkar sudah selesai agenda kenegaraan. Saat ini Golkar melaksanakan agenda politik menuju Munas, yang harus dilaksanakan tahun ini," ujar Airlangga dalam keterangannya, Sabtu (2/11/2019).


Airlangga Hartarto Foto: Golkar

Airlangga pun menyatakan sejumlah programnya untuk membangun partai beringin agar lebih besar. "Jika Golkar ingin menang maka harus solid. Sekolah publik policy akan dibangun untuk pengkaderan. Agar kader Golkar lebih cerdas dan paham dalam membuat UU,memahami ideologi Golkar dan menyumbangkan ide-ide untuk pembangunan Indonesia kedepan," ungkap Airlangga.
Ketua Umum Kosgoro 57, Agung Laksono menyatakan Pemberian rekomendasi ini karena Airlangga Hartarto banyak berjasa untuk Partai Golkar. Bahkan, banyak kader Golkar yang kemudian menduduki kursi menteri dan wakil menteri dalam kabinet Joko Widodo-KH Ma'ruf Amin.
Agung yang juga mewakili peserta Konsolidasi Nasional, membacakan surat dukungan kepada Airlangga Hartarto. "Kami memberikan apresiasi kepemimpinan Ketua Umum Partai Golkar, Airlangga Hartarto. Apresiasi ini memiliki banyak dasar," kata Agung Laksono.
Dalam acara Konsolidasi Nasional ini selain pimpinan Ormas Tri Karya, hadir pula Wakil Ketua Pembina Golkar, Theo Sambuaga, Menpora Zainudin Amali, Menteri Perindustrian Agus Gumiwang, Wakil Ketua DPR RI Azis Syamsudin, Wamen Perdagangan Jerry Sambuaga, dan Ketua Dewan Kehormatan Partai Golkar Akbar Tanjung serta sejumlah Ketua DPD 1 Golkar se-Indonesia Timur.
Dukungan dan rekomendasi itu berarti ketiga organisasi inti Partai Golkar ini mendukung penuh Airlangga Hartarto untuk tampil dalam Munas 2019.
"Termasuk mengambil kebijakan strategis konsolidasi Golkar. Kami juga sepakat bersama-sama mendukung penuh, memperjuangkan dan memenangkan saudara Airlangga Hartarto untuk menjadi Ketum Golkar masa bakti 2019-2024," seru Agung Laksono saat membacakan surat dukungan.
Sementara dalam sambutannya Akbar Tanjung dari Dewan Kehormatan, menyampaikan ada beberapa agenda politik penting pada tahun 2020 seperti Pilkada di sejumlah daerah. Bahkan ia juga sudah melihat agenda strategis pada 2024 yakni Pileg dan Pilpres.
Akbar Tanjung berharap wilayah Sulut dan Indonesia Timur dapat memenangkan Golkar pada setiap kontestasi. "Optimisme, komitmen yang kuat dan memperkuat soliditas partai adalah modal untuk kemenangan," kata Akbar Tanjung.

Airlangga: Golkar Ready to Carry Out Political Agenda
02 Nov 2019, 11:08 by Sukma Medianti Test
Manado - Support for Airlangga Hartarto to hold the Golkar Party Chairperson at the December 2019 National Conference in Jakarta resumed. This time the support was delivered by the Tri Karya Golkar Party organization, so that the Coordinating Minister for the Economy would lead the banyan party in the 2019-2024 period.
In the Tri-Golkar Mass Organization National Consolidation event, on Friday (11/01/2019) in Manado, North Sulawesi, the three organizations Kosgoro 57, Soksi and MKGR expressed their support. The three of them directly gave a recommendation letter to Airlangga who was also present at the meeting.
Airlangga itself welcomed the trust given to him. "All want the Golkar Party to become a big party. Golkar has finished the state agenda. At present Golkar is implementing a political agenda towards the National Conference, which must be held this year," Airlangga said in his statement on Saturday (11/02/2019).


Airlangga Hartarto Photo: Golkar

Airlangga also stated a number of programs to build the banyan party to be bigger. "If Golkar wants to win, it must be solid. Public policy schools will be built for cadre training. So that Golkar cadres are smarter and more knowledgeable in making laws, understanding Golkar ideology and contributing ideas for future development in Indonesia," Airlangga said.
Kosgoro 57 Chairperson Agung Laksono said that this recommendation was given because Airlangga Hartarto contributed a lot to the Golkar Party. In fact, many Golkar cadres later occupied the minister and deputy minister seats in the Joko Widodo-KH Ma'ruf Amin cabinet.
Agung, who also represented National Consolidation participants, read a letter of support to Airlangga Hartarto. "We appreciate the leadership of the Golkar Party Chairperson, Airlangga Hartarto. This appreciation has many foundations," Agung Laksono said.
In this National Consolidation event in addition to the leader of the Tri Karya Mass Organization, there was also the Deputy Chairperson of the Golkar Trustees, Theo Sambuaga, Menpora Zainudin Amali, Industry Minister Agus Gumiwang, Deputy Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament Azis Syamsudin, Trade Deputy Jerry Sambuaga, and Chairman of the Golkar Honorary Board Akbar Tanjung and a number of Chairpersons of the Golkar DPD 1 in Eastern Indonesia.
This support and recommendation means that the three core Golkar Party organizations fully support Airlangga Hartarto to appear at the 2019 National Conference.
"Including taking Golkar's consolidated strategic policy. We also agreed to jointly support, fully fight for and win Brother Airlangga Hartarto to become the Golkar Chairperson for the 2019-2024 term," Agung Laksono exclaimed when reading a letter of support.
While in his remarks Akbar Tanjung from the Honorary Board, said that there were several important political agendas in 2020 such as regional elections in a number of regions. In fact he has also seen a strategic agenda in 2024 namely the Pileg and Pilpres.
Akbar Tanjung hopes that North Sulawesi and Eastern Indonesia can win Golkar in each contestation. "Optimism, strong commitment and strengthening party solidity are capital for victory," said Akbar Tanjung.
